Package org.drupal.project.computing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DSiteExtended
    An interface to declare additional features of accessing Drupal.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DApplication
    This is the base class for Computing Applications.
    DCommand
    This is the base class for all Drupal Computing command.
    DConfig
    This is the config class to help initialize DSite and DApplication.
    DDatabase
    Not implemented yet.
    DDrush
    This is the utility class to run drush command.
    DDrushSite
    The Drupal site instance that can be accessed directly through drush.
    DRecord
    This class maps to a Computing Record entity in Drupal.
    DRestfulJsonServices
    This class allows accessing Drupal using the services.module.
    DServicesSite
    Uses Drupal Services REST Server to access Drupal.
    DSite
    This is the super class to model a Drupal site.
    DUtils
    Singleton of utilities class.
    DUtils.Json
    Utility class for Json.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DRecord.Status
    Status of the record, usually set by the program.
